tool_description: Validates URLs and DOIs in citations by checking accessibility, correctness, and providing status information.

timeout_seconds.description: Timeout for each link check in seconds (5-30)

error_messages: No links provided: Provide at least one URL or DOI to validate.
Invalid timeout value: Timeout must be between 5 and 30 seconds.
Too many links: Maximum 100 links allowed per validation request.
Invalid URL format: One or more URLs are not properly formatted.
usage: Provide arrays of urls and/or dois to validate. Optionally set timeout_seconds for network requests. The tool checks accessibility and correctness.

url_results.description: Validation results for each URL with status codes

doi_results.description: Validation results for each DOI with resolution status

valid_links.description: Number of links that are accessible

broken_links.description: Number of links that are broken or inaccessible

validation_summary.description: Overall summary of link validation results
